grant_metadata.name: Active Citizen Grant
grant_metadata.desc: The Active Citizen Grant encourages ground-up initiatives through innovating and organising activities in any of the following three domains: sports volunteerism, physical activity or health & wellness initiatives.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Asia-Ready Exposure Programme (AEP)
grant_metadata.desc: Supports projects that provide youth with industry and cultural exposure to ASEAN member states, China and India, up to $1,000 per eligible youth.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Call for Ideas Fund
grant_metadata.desc: The Call for Ideas Fund provides co-funding for projects that seek to resolve environmental challenges in the local community through outreach and education.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Charities Capability Fund (CCF)
grant_metadata.desc: Supports exempt/registered charities and Institutions of a Public Character to enhance governance/management capabilities and operational efficiency.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html:
Complete and submit the online form. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

The application should take about 30-45 minutes to complete with all the information on hand.

grant_metadata.name: Charities Capability Fund (CCF) - Training Grant
grant_metadata.desc: The CCF Training Grant supports training courses (local classroom-based courses and local/overseas online courses) for charities' board members and staff (who have served in the charities for at least 6 months with an official designation) in key governance and management areas.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Coach Development Grant
grant_metadata.desc: The Coach Development Grant (CDG) provides financial assistance to individual sports coaches and coach developers who wish to upgrade their coaching knowledge and skills.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Communities of Care Grant
grant_metadata.desc: The Communities of Care Grant (COC) provides grant funding/support to individuals and organisations who wish to run a sports programme to benefit underserved and vulnerable populations in Singapore.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Community Capability Trust (CCT)
grant_metadata.desc: CCT is dedicated to strengthening Social Service Agencies (SSAs) through sustainable use of resources, to deliver better service outcomes.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html:
Complete and submit the online form. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

The application should take about 30-45 minutes to complete with all the information on hand.

For clarifications, please email us at sector_capability@ncss.gov.sg.

grant_metadata.name: Community Care Manpower Development Award (CCMDA)
grant_metadata.desc: CCMDA caters for entry and advanced skills training in a range of clinical and non-clinical areas for both in-service and fresh entrants. Its Visiting Expert scheme also funds the invitation of a local or overseas expert to visit your organisation for training.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: Community Care Nursing Leadership Programme (CCNLP)
grant_metadata.desc: The Community Care Nursing Leadership Programme (CCNLP) aims to ensure the continuity of nursing leadership and facilitate the succession planning of nursing leaders in the Community Care sector.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: Community Care Research Grant (CCRG)
grant_metadata.desc: The Community Care Research Grant (CCRG) provides support for research projects undertaken by the Community Care sector to generate new knowledge and transform care.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: Community Integration Fund
grant_metadata.desc: The CIF supports ground-up projects which create more opportunities for locals and foreigners to interact, and to help newcomers adapt to Singapore society.
grant_metadata.agency_name: Ministry of Culture, Community and Youth
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Creation Grant
grant_metadata.desc: Supports the creation, adaption and redevelopment of distinctive Singapore-made artistic works.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Cultural Matching Fund (CMF)
grant_metadata.desc: The Cultural Matching Fund provides dollar-for-dollar matching grants for private cash donations to registered charities in the arts and heritage sector
grant_metadata.agency_name: Ministry of Culture, Community, and Youth - National Arts Council
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Employment Facilitation – Manpower Recruitment and Training Initiatives (FY22-FY26)
grant_metadata.desc: The Employment Facilitation - Manpower Recruitment and Training Initiatives (EF-MRTI) is introduced to attract, train, and retain local support care staff in the Community Care sector and to recognise Community Care Organisations (CCOs) for their efforts and investment in the attraction and retention of locals.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: Enabling Sports Fund
grant_metadata.desc: The Enabling Sports Fund (ESF) provides grants to support new and existing community-initiated disability sport initiatives.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Enhanced Fund-raising Programme
grant_metadata.desc: Supports organisations in efforts to raise funds and better meet the needs of the underserved in society.

grant_metadata.name: Enterprise Innovation and Capability Development Grant (InnoGrant)
grant_metadata.desc: InnoGrant seeks innovative technological solutions to revolutionise sport and fitness experiences.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: GP IT Enablement (GP ITE) Grant
grant_metadata.desc: The GP IT Enablement (GP ITE) Grant is a one-off grant to support GP clinics in adopting a Clinic Management System (CMS) under the CMS Tiering Framework for Primary Care.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: General Project Grant
grant_metadata.desc: Supports projects that align with Tote Board's funding principles and strategic outcomes with direct funding.

grant_metadata.name: HARMONY FUND (HF)
grant_metadata.desc: The Harmony Fund supports creative projects that promote racial and religious harmony in Singapore.
grant_metadata.agency_name: Ministry of Culture, Community and Youth
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: Heritage Grants Scheme - Major Project Grant
grant_metadata.desc: MJG offers a higher level of funding support, providing up to 80% of total qualifying costs or net deficit, whichever is lower, for high impact community heritage projects.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html:
Complete all the fields in the application form and additional templates (if applicable) unless they are marked as optional. The entire application should take about 30 mins to complete with all the information on hand.

DOCUMENTS REQUIRED FOR APPLICATION

Complete the following documents and upload them to the relevant sections of the form before you submit your application:

grant_metadata.name: Heritage Grants Scheme - Minor Project Grant
grant_metadata.desc: MNG provides funding support of up to 80% of total qualifying costs or net deficit, whichever is lower, for a diverse range of community heritage projects.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html:
Complete all the fields in the application form and additional templates (if applicable) unless they are marked as optional. The entire application should take about 30 mins to complete with all the information on hand.

DOCUMENTS REQUIRED FOR APPLICATION

Complete the following documents and upload them to the relevant sections of the form before you submit your application:

grant_metadata.name: Heritage Research Grant
grant_metadata.desc: HRG supports research projects on Singapore’s tangible and intangible heritage, archaeology as well as technology-based projects for the documentation and preservation of Singapore’s heritage.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html:
Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.
  1. Applications are only accepted through the OurSG Grants portal via your supporting institution’s Corppass account
  2. There are five (5) Core Research Areas for the HRG Grant Call. Proposals must align with at least one Core Research Areas to be eligible for application.
    The seven (7) Priority Research Themes for HRG released from 02/FY2023 supports NHB’s Our SG Heritage Plan 2.0 (HP2.0) to prioritise proposals that align with HP2.0’s focus areas and NHB-wide research agenda.
    Please refer to the Annex A on the Core Research Areas and Priority Research Themes.
  3. For more information, please refer to Heritage Research Grant Application Guidelines (Annex B) or HRG corporate webpage. You may also wish to consult the List of HRG Award Projects in 2023.
  • Annex A - Heritage Research Grant 02-FY2023 Research Core Areas & Research Themes (for reference only)
  • Annex B - HRG Application Guidelines
  • List of HRG Awarded Projects

grant_metadata.name: Integrated Community Care Provider (ICCP) Phase 1 and 2
grant_metadata.desc: The Funding for Integrated Community Care Provider (ICCP) Year 1 and 2 is provided to each sub-region to form partnerships and practice service and care coordination.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: Lively Places Fund
grant_metadata.desc: Interested to start a project to enliven Singapore's public space? Find out if you are eligible to apply for the Lively Places Fund.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html:
For MSCP Rooftop Gardening Proposals

The application for MSCP rooftop gardening proposals is currently closed. The next application window will open from 1 March to 30 April 2026.

The application form will be made available online from 1 March 2026 onwards, and all applicants will be notified via email on the outcomes of your submission in July 2026.

For Project Fund and Building Fund Proposals

Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Love Our ’Hood Fund
grant_metadata.desc: The Love Our ’Hood Fund supports projects that address municipal issues and/or foster a sense of community within the neighbourhood to manage neighbourly issues amicably.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Major Company Scheme
grant_metadata.desc: The Major Company Scheme supports the professional and artistic development of registered arts organisations that represent excellence in their core mission.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Market and Audience Development
grant_metadata.desc: This grant supports your activities to build audiences, patrons and supporters that complement artistic efforts at home and abroad.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: NYF (Research Grant)
grant_metadata.desc: The National Youth Fund (NYF) Research Grant provides funding for projects that deepen the understanding of salient youth issues or trends.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: OUR SINGAPORE FUND (Community)
grant_metadata.desc: Have an idea for projects that bring communities together, that promotes Singapore's national identity and shared values? Find out if you are eligible to apply for Our Singapore Fund.
grant_metadata.agency_name: Ministry of Culture, Community and Youth
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html:
Complete the Applicant checklist above to find out your project's alignment to OSF(C)'s eligibility, funding requirements and objectives.

If your project is aligned, you may submit an application, which should take about 45 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: Organisation Transformation Grant
grant_metadata.desc: The Organisation Transformation Grant (OTG) supports heritage businesses to adopt innovative ideas for the sustainability and viability of their businesses.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Pay-It-Forward Award
grant_metadata.desc: Each conferred Youth Corps leader is awarded $3,000 project grant to initiate and sustain ground-up initiatives to serve the local community.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: Preschool Opportunity Fund (PSOF)
grant_metadata.desc: The Preschool Opportunity Fund (PSOF) provides funding support to assist children from low-income families, who are enrolled in childcare and kindergarten operators (that are not on the Anchor Operator [AOP] scheme), access holistic development activities.
grant_metadata.agency_name: Ministry of Social and Family Development
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated. Centre is to submit 1 application per centre.

grant_metadata.name: Presentation & Participation
grant_metadata.desc: Supports the presentation of arts activities and works that express and enrich our artistic diversity, as well as increase arts appreciation and participation in Singapore.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Presentation & Participation (Extended Play)
grant_metadata.desc: Supports the production of Extended Play (EP) and full-length music albums to add to the diversity and quality of music in Singapore.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Presentation & Participation (Publishing)
grant_metadata.desc: Supports professional book publishers or authors, who are committed to advancing the literary arts in Singapore, for the publication of original and translated works.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: President's Challenge
grant_metadata.desc: Supports initiatives that uplift aspirations, abilities and potential of those who start with greater odds, through upstream preventive or direct intervention.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Production Grant
grant_metadata.desc: Supports artists and art intermediaries in producing and presenting signature artistic works and platforms that can have significant impact and legacy for our arts scene.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Productivity and Digitalisation Grant (PDG)
grant_metadata.desc: PDG supports the sector’s needs by focusing on 5 strategic areas, while promoting productivity and digitalisation.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: Professional Capability Grant (Closed Grant Call)
grant_metadata.desc: This category focuses on courses that seeks to attract talents to join the social service sector, which includes Mid-Career Conversion courses and Social Service Tribe Study Award. It also funds courses to empower the social service leaders, at different skills level.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Please select the relevant grant scheme and fill in the application form.

grant_metadata.name: Professional Capability Grant (Open Grant Call)
grant_metadata.desc: This category focuses on courses that will develop and retain talents in the social service sector, which includes short to mid-term local and overseas training courses as well as clinical supervision that will build the manpower capability of the SSAs. It also funds social service projects aimed at improving staff competencies and the Sabbatical Leave Scheme (SLS) that focuses on staff wellness.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Please select the relevant grant scheme and fill in the application form

grant_metadata.name: Programme X Fund
grant_metadata.desc: Programme X Fundings supports youth-initiated projects, enabling young changemakers to drive positive change in the Singapore community and society.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Research Grant
grant_metadata.desc: Supports research which expands knowledge and information of the arts and culture sector and enables academics, researchers, artists and non-profit arts organisations to carry out such researches.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: SG Cyber Talent Development Fund
grant_metadata.desc: The SG Cyber Talent Development fund supports projects that engage, upskill or train individuals to explore, grow their passions for and develop their careers in cybersecurity.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: SG60 Towards Sustainability Fund
grant_metadata.desc: Explore funding for social service agencies (SSAs) to kickstart their capabilities in measuring, monitoring, and reporting the effectiveness of their programmes.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: SINGAPORE-ASEAN YOUTH FUND (SAYF)
grant_metadata.desc: Create a better community not only in your own backyard, but all over Asia with the SAYF. Join hands and promote ASEAN youth interaction and greater mutual understanding with other YSOs
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: SUSTAIN THE ARTS (stART) FUND (ORGANISATION FUNDING)
grant_metadata.desc: The Sustain The Arts (stART) Fund is an initiative by the National Arts Council (NAC), supported by the private sector to boost the long-term sustainability of small arts organisations, and to nurture a culture of giving to the arts.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: SUSTAIN THE ARTS (stART) FUND (PROGRAMME FUNDING)
grant_metadata.desc: The Sustain The Arts (stART) Fund is an initiative by the National Arts Council (NAC), supported by the private sector to boost the long-term sustainability of small arts organisations, and to nurture a culture of giving to the arts.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: The Capability Development Grant
grant_metadata.desc: The Capability Development Grant (CD Grant) supports the continuous professional development of the people that work in Singapore’s arts and culture sector.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Tote Board Arts Fund
grant_metadata.desc: The Tote Board Arts Fund provides support to local artists/arts groups in bringing the arts to communities for people to connect with one another.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Tote Board Better Health Fund (TBBHF)
grant_metadata.desc: The Tote Board Better Health Fund (TBBHF) is a seed fund to pilot innovative programmes with a potential to scale within the community care sector.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: Tote Board Community Health Fund (TBCHF) FY2020-FY2024 Tranche
grant_metadata.desc: TBCHF supports innovative and scalable pilot programmes in the community care sector.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete the application, which should take about 30 mins if you have the information on hand. All fields are necessary unless they are marked as optional.

grant_metadata.name: WECARE ARTS FUND (WCAF)
grant_metadata.desc: Supports Social Service Agencies (SSAs) in engaging their beneficieries through the arts, to increase arts access within the social service sector.
grant_metadata.agency_name: Community Development Council - National Arts Council
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Complete all the fields unless they are marked as optional. The application should take about 30 mins to complete with all the information on hand.

grant_metadata.name: YOUNG CHANGEMAKERS (YCM)
grant_metadata.desc: Have a cool idea that can contribute to the community? The Young ChangeMakers Grant supports youth-initiated projects that benefit the Singapore community and society.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Youth Corps Affiliate Project Grant (YCAF)
grant_metadata.desc: The Youth Corps Affiliate Project Grant supports Affiliate-initiated projects that drive a positive impact within the local community.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Youth Corps Aspirant Project (YCAP)
grant_metadata.desc: The Youth Corps Aspirant Project (YCAP) Grant is open to all aspirant project teams in the Youth Corps Leaders Programme.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Youth Corps Cluster Project Grant (YCCL)
grant_metadata.desc: The Youth Corps Cluster Project Grant supports Cluster-initiated projects that drive a positive impact within the local community.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.

grant_metadata.name: Youth Corps Expedition Project
grant_metadata.desc: Supports youths embarking on Service-Learning projects involving communities in Asia, with a focus on the ASEAN member states, China and India.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html:
Complete all the fields on the application form and the additional templates provided below.

The application should take about 30 minutes to complete with all the information on hand.

grant_metadata.name: Youth Expedition Project Goes Online (YEP-GO)
grant_metadata.desc: YEP-GO is a platform for youths to continue volunteering with the overseas communities without travel. Youths can connect with overseas partner organisations to develop programmes through virtual means.
grant_metadata.how_to_apply_html: Completing the grant application should take about 30 mins with all the information on hand. All fields are mandatory unless otherwise stated.
